p.k: This exclusive show takes you to paradise when Nikolai visits crystal blue lagoons, encounters sharks and stingrays during his trip to witness the 6th editions of the Muramur surfski race in Tahiti. This look at the intensive 38 km race meandering through reefs that surround the mystic island of Bora Bora is bound to make you pack your flippers and book a flight to these exotic islands.
